column4: I have installed Ubuntu but I can't access my slave hd, anyone can help on that?
FliesLIkeABrick it was on a computer with windows before so it,s probably formated with windows
I've get plenty of stuff when writing dmesg | grep hd (mainly because that my cddrive appear confused), and my slave hd is listed
ok then the kernel is seeing your hard disc. what does it show up as? hdb?
I enter my password and it wrote nothing, so should it have worked? I don't see it more but maybe Im searching at the wrong place, since I've installed Ubuntu today hehe
ok so you have only one partition.
Mount : error in the system files, option or super bloc (sorry it's appearing in french so I don't think it's the same in english but I've tried to traduce)
which type of filesystem.. .ntfs or fat?
